trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Ocean City
There were no other sightings in Ocean City on or around December 12th 2007
Summary: I actualy saw a bronze shaped disc in broad day light flying aprox. 500feet over head.disc about 30-35 feet across
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile on my lunch break I was siting out back and looked up.I observed a round,bronze colored disk flying towords me overhead.It made no sound and was moving from a north to south direction.(against the wind)The speed was best described as fluid.The sighting lasted about 40-50 seconds when it entered into a cloud and did not apear out the other side.The color was not shiney but more of a muted color.However it should have come out of the other side of the cloud it went into.(I would think).I have seen alot of strange things in 22 years of law enforcement so I guess I was more observing than feeling anything.
